Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 11.3 with a standard deviation 3.2. The z-score of the person with 10.9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.13
* 0.16
* 1.26

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.13: Correct
* 0.16: Incorrect
* 1.26: Incorrect
